Boots Honey & Oatmeal Shampoo (600 ml) Price: Rs.685

You are watching a daily soap
column15: and wondering if you could have such picture perfect shiny hair; this Boots shampoo will make it possible. Treat your dry and damaged hair with this nourishing shampoo from Boots. Organic in nature
column16: this shampoo is beneficial for pampering damaged hair
column17: which is otherwise very difficult to manage. Suitable for both men and women
column18:
this Boots Honey and Oatmeal Shampoo will provide a lustrous shine to your hair.

\r\n

\r\n\tFormulated with active natural ingredients such as acacia honey and oat extracts
column19: this shampoo contains properties that will bring back the lost life to your hair. Acacia honey is the food for healthy
column20: nourished and enriched hair. Honey is a humectant
column21: thus attracting and holding on a lot of moisture. This property makes honey the best choice for dry hair. Provide your hair with natural health that it might have lost due to the exposure to sun and other microbes
column22:
by using this shampoo as it contains oat extracts.

Directions for Use

  • Dispense an adequate amount of shampoo onto your palm.
  • Apply the shampoo on wet hair.
  • Create lather by massaging gently.
  • Rinse well with water.
